item.title: Dragon Claws Hitting to high for last special
item.dc:creator: @Shockdott Shockdott
item.description:
@Shockdott wrote:

Dragon Claws Hitting to high for last special just in pvp.
so i opend up my playervsplayer and this is what the claws look likeâ€¦case 14484: p.graphics(1950, 0); p.animate(10961, 0); int dclaw1 = meleeDamage/2;int dclaw2 = meleeDamage/4;int dclaw3 = meleeDamage/4; if (meleeDamage == 0) { dclaw1 = calculateMelee(p, p2); dclaw2 = dclaw1/2; dclaw3 = dclaw1/4; } if (meleeDamage == 0 && dclaw1 == 0) { dclaw2 = calculateMelee(p, p2); dclaw3= dclaw2/2; } if (meleeDamage == 0 && dclaw1 == 0 && dclaw2 == 0) { dclaw3 = calculateMelee(p, p2); } final int[] fDclaw = {dclaw1, dclaw2, dclaw3}; World.getWorld().submit(new Tickable(1) { public void execute() { p2.hit(p, meleeDamage); World.getWorld().submit(new Tickable(1) { public void execute() { p2.hit(p, fDclaw[0]); p2.hit(p, fDclaw[1]); p2.hit(p, fDclaw[2]); this.stop(); } }); this.stop(); } });

i need help to fix it please help me

Read full topic
